column4: I'd like to know exactly what I need to do in order to boot Ubuntu 7.04 x86 from the live disc with support for my graphics card.
I know, but I want to boot without using safe graphics mode.
not a compelling reason for 64bit unless you have an app that needs more than 4G ram at a time
or use same seperate /home partition  and install / for 32 and 64 on seperate partitions
